casebody.data:
No. 10-9918. Ravon Romance, Petitioner v. Mark Bradt, Superintendent, Elmira Correctional Facility. 563 U.S. 1025, 131 S. Ct. 2939,

180 L. Ed. 2d 232,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4053. May 31, 2011.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.

Same case below, 391 Fed. Appx. 89.
